document_data.mainbody:
Rider of the Evening Breeze, or simply Evening Breeze to close friends, was an androsphinx inhabiting the Haunted Lands in 1367 DR.
Evening Breeze was known to approach travelers passing through the Haunted Lands, requesting hospitality through the bond of salt. Evening Breeze was gravely insulted by any refusals. In exchange for hospitality the androsphinx warned travelers of local dangers and offered his protection for the evening.
